actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Corps of Engineers to cooperate with the States and subdivisions thereof in the enforcement of State and local laws and ordinances in lands owned by the United States and developed by the Corps of Engineers for public use.

summary.text: Authorizes the Corps of Engineers to cooperate with the States and subdivisions thereof in the enforcement of State and local laws and ordinances in lands owned by the United States and developed by the Corps of Engineers for public use.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Corps of Engineers to cooperate with the States and subdivisions thereof in the enforcement of State and local laws and ordinances in lands owned by the United States and developed by the Corps of Engineers for public use.
